name: Chamisul Fresh
description: The most popular soju in South Korea, known for its clean and crisp taste.

name: Daesun
description: A soju with a smooth and light taste, recently gaining popularity.

name: Cheoeum-Cheoreom Mild Taste
description: A mild and smooth soju that is popular among consumers along with Chamisul Fresh.

name: Jinro
description: A soju with a retro design and low alcohol content at launch, which gained popularity.

name: Good Day
description: A smooth and mild soju popular among the younger generation.

name: Halla-san
description: A soju produced in Jeju Island, known for its high alcohol content and unique flavor.

name: Hwayo
description: A premium distilled liquor with a deep and rich taste.

name: Baekseju
description: A traditional Korean medicinal wine, emphasizing a subtle sweetness and health image.

name: Isul Tok Tok
description: A low-alcohol fruit-flavored soju, perfect for light enjoyment.

name: Maehwasu
description: A soju infused with plum blossom flavor, known for its refreshing taste.
